alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 22 at 1:29PM PDT until April 22 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Morongo Basin, Eastern Mojave Desert and Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust could reduce visibility on area highways such as Interstates 15 and 40 and Highway 62.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert
